name: Spooky Fruits
description:
🐧 Level up, collect cute fruits and kill ghosts with hundred of weapons and many powers.

👻 Spooky Fruits 🍎 is a casual, offline arcade, roguelike and rpg shooter game where you have to kill ghosts to level up and upgrade you character with hundred of weapons, super powers and new skills.

🎯 Main objective is to complete all achievements and missions at the while you try to collect coins and highest score of all players.

🍰 While you kill ghost, you have to collect apples for your farm that you can use to make delicious desserts, which upgrades your character's stats and skills to go through different worlds and fight the final boss.

⚔️ CHARACTERISTICS ☠️

• More than 50 weapons, 25 super powers and 110 different skills.

• Play offline, play without connection. 

• Variety of enemies and cute characters. 

• Online leaderboard to compete with other players. 

• A lot of achievements and missions to complete. 

• Cute graphics and sounds. 

• Easy controls. 

• Free to play without ads :D.
